name: Niu's Adventure
description:
Niu's Adventure is a 3D Platformer made with Unity and Blender.

I took part in this project as: lead programmer and vice team leader.

This project was realized with a team of five students in my third semester of game design studies.

The final version of this project has the following features included:

  • normal jump
  • double jump
  • punching snakes
  • basic dialogue system
  • pushing crates
  • collecting coins

Background plot:

Niu's village was attack by the tunnel snake clan during his return from his pilgrimage.

Protect the village by fighting of the snakes and collecting the treasure scattered across the town!
